reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that specific personal information is collected when using the app integrated with Facebook, specifying the categories of data collected.
reply.reference: We gather specific personal information when you utilize our app, which is integrated with Facebook. The categories of data we collect encompass: - Email Address, Name, Profile Picture. URL: https://onourem.com/policy.html

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use. The collected data is used for personalization, communication, and account retrieval purposes.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions that the gathered data, including email address, name, and profile picture, is used for personalization, communication, and account retrieval purposes. This indicates that the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.
reply.reference:
We utilize the gathered data for the following objectives:
- Personalization : Your name and profile picture contribute to tailoring your interactions within the app, amplifying your user experience.
- Communication : Your email address serves the purpose of delivering crucial notifications and app-related updates to you. Additionally, the email address is used for account retrieval purposes. URL: https://onourem.com/policy.html

Privacy Policy
Last updated: Aug 16, 2023
Hello Folks! Allow us to present to you Onourem’s Privacy Policy which describes our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. While all this might sound too typical and technical, we have made a genuine attempt to make it comprehensive to everyone by offering this quick summary to you at the end. reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the user has the right to withdraw consent on using their Personal Data, and they can exercise their GDPR Data Protection Rights to request the deletion or removal of their data.
reply.reference: You have the right to withdraw Your consent on using your Personal Data. If You withdraw Your consent, We may not be able to provide You with access to certain specific functionalities of the Service. Exercising of Your GDPR Data Protection Rights. You may exercise Your rights of access, rectification, cancellation and opposition. URL: https://onourem.com/policy.html

reply.analysis: The Privacy Policy mentions multiple instances where the app shares data with different entities for various purposes, indicating that data sharing with third parties does occur.

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with Service Providers, Business partners, Affiliates, Educational Institutions, other users, and Group/business partners. This includes monitoring and analyzing service usage, supporting and maintaining the service, advertising, payment processing, business transfers, maintaining business relationships, and enabling essential services for mental wellness support.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy outlines various entities with which the app may share data, including service providers, business partners, affiliates, educational institutions, other users, and group/business partners, for purposes such as monitoring usage, supporting services, advertising, mental wellness support, and legal requirements.
reply.reference: With Service Providers, For Business transfers, With Affiliates, With Business partners, With other users, How we share information?, URL: https://onourem.com/policy.html
